captions.text: It's really amazing that I can see Red Bull's top athletes riding up close.
I was always watching them on the web or TV.
I am truly grateful that I can watch their practice and real riding in person.
They are awesome, and at the same time,
I realized they are really friendly people after meeting them face to face,
which you can't tell from just watching their videos.

title: Bringing BMX to Japan's Future Pros - Red Bull Local Hero Tour

comments.text: Why haven't they put suspension on BMX bikes yet? Weight?﻿
comments.author: ur mum

comments.text:
+Gaming in HD Yea suspensions, are just to heavy and clumsy and are only 
really any good riding over rough terrain - Most people make the mistake 
thinking that it helps with big drops too but from anyone that has ever 
rid BMX, would know that it just isn't needed.
